title: airfinex
author: airfinex
content: How can I find out or read the act itself? How can I find a reference to this law?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: From my understanding of David sacks[1] tweet (and someone correct me if I'm wrong here). The strategic reserve announcement made yesterday, is not a new executive order. But connected Executive Order N 14178[2].Â [1] https://x.com/davidsacks47/status/1896246273143161295[2] https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/documents/executive-order-14178-strengthening-american-leadership-digital-financial-technology
